definition: terminus
always/to assemble/gather/total/overall/head/chief/general/in every case
station/to stand/to halt/to stop/branch of a company or organization/website

sentences.english: This is the photo of bus station exit.
sentences.chinese: 這是火車東站的汽車總站出口。

sentences.english: A river port and a bus terminal are joint together in one building built in a shape of a ship.
sentences.chinese: 這是河港與巴士總站相連成船舶狀的建築物。

sentences.english: Sun Yinghong, the vice station master of municipal hydrological monitoring station said, it's a misunderstanding.
sentences.chinese: 市水文監測總站副站長孫映宏說，這其實是一種誤區。

sentences.english: The waste water was piped up from the sub-stations to the central station for cleaning.
sentences.chinese: 污水通過管道從分站向上輸送到總站去淨化。

sentences.english: And we were invited to have hot pot in Jiafu Hot Pot near to the bus station.
sentences.chinese: 當天晚上她請我們在總站旁邊的家福火鍋喫飯。

sentences.english: In the afternoon the buses fill up from the terminal at Ngong Ping.
sentences.chinese: 下午在昂坪的總站公共汽車上總會坐滿人。

sentences.english: It is located at ground floor near the public transport terminus and is accessible from Yi Nam Road.
sentences.chinese: 位於地下近公共交通總站，可由怡南路前往。

sentences.english: It connects Light Rail Transit terminus and West Rail Station at the first floor.
sentences.chinese: 在一樓連接輕便鐵路總站及西鐵站。

sentences.english: We parted company at the bus terminal.
sentences.chinese: 我們是在公共汽車總站分手的。

sentences.english: The traffic is smoothly around here, that the factory is just 500 meters away from Zhongshan City Official Bus Station.
sentences.chinese: 工廠距離中山市汽車總站僅500米，交通非常便利。

sentences.english: My own house feels as filthy and chaotic as a bus terminal.
sentences.chinese: 我自己的房子感覺和公共汽車總站一樣污濁混亂。

sentences.english: PC will be provided by CowieStation for this competition.
sentences.chinese: 科衛總站將提供一部電腦供參賽者比賽。

sentences.english: It is a five-minute walk from the bus No. 5 bus terminus .
sentences.chinese: 從5路公共汽車總站起，走路只要5分鐘。

sentences.english: Do not see the faces of victory I Termini on the losing side.
sentences.chinese: 看不到時間勝利的臉，我總站在輸的一方。

sentences.english: He insisted on seeing me to the bus tenminal
sentences.chinese: 他堅持把我送到公共汽車總站。

sentences.english: My home is close to a bus terminal.
sentences.chinese: 我家離公共汽車總站很近。

definition: website
"through train" (refers to the idea of retaining previous legislature after transition to Chinese rule in Hong Kong or Macao)
to transfer/to change trains, buses etc
bus/abbr. for 公共汽車|公共汽车[gong1 gong4 qi4 che1]/car belonging to an organization and used by its members (government car, police car, company car etc)/abbr. for 公務用車|公务用车[gong1 wu4 yong4 che1]
parking lot/car park
Wan Chai district of Hong Kong
Tuen Mun district of New Territories, Hong Kong
shuttle bus ferrying passengers between train stations on two different rail lines
Tianqiao district of Jinan city 濟南市|济南市[Ji3 nan2 shi4], Shandong/Tianqiao district in Beijing, formerly a center of folk culture
overhead walkway/pedestrian bridge
dock/pier/wharf/CL:個|个[ge4]
to change train (plane, bus etc)/transfer between modes of transport
itinerary/route/political line (e.g. right revisionist road)/CL:條|条[tiao2]
departure (of a coach or train)/to dispatch a vehicle
subway/metro
light rail/transit system (underground, at street level or elevated)/streetcar/metro/abbr. for 輕型軌道交通|轻型轨道交通[qing1 xing2 gui3 dao4 jiao1 tong1]
to access/to transfer passengers between two railway lines
